price: Ati Yaa nama! Gooftaa kee kan Arjaa ta'etti (amanuu irraa) maaltu si dage?
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu mā gharraka birabbika al-karīmi
